post:
SupremeBytes, LLC is now back in stock with our OVZ-128 packages for just $20 a year or $2.30 a month. Our OpenVZ servers have the following features included:  

* Server locations: Los Angeles, New Jersey, or France
* All of the virtual servers come with at least 100Mbps port speed
* The servers are unmanaged, and you should manage it by your self, but we will help you as much as we can.
* All of the Servers include 1 IPv4, and you can order more if you need.
* Full IPv6 support

**OVZ-128**  
RAM 128/256  
DISK SPACE 10 GB  
CPU 1  
TRANSFER 100 GB  
1 IPv4  
**$2.30/month or $20/year**  
Order: https://secure.supremebytes.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=99  


**OVZ-512**  
RAM 512/1024  
DISK SPACE 50 GB  
CPU 1  
TRANSFER 500 GB  
1 IPv4  
**$7/month** or $78/yearly  
Order: https://secure.supremebytes.com/billing/cart.php?a=add&pid=92  


Location: Los Angeles  
OpenVZ with SolusVM Management
